## useDetailsHeaderRenderer() function

Overrides the default details header rendering so we can inject customization

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useDetailsHeaderRenderer(): IRenderFunction<IDetailsHeaderProps>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

IRenderFunction&lt;IDetailsHeaderProps&gt;
